text: “Ndithu adakudzerani kale Yûsuf ndi zisonyezo zoonekera poyera (Mûsa asadadze). Koma simudaleke kuzikaikira zimene adadza nazo kwa inu, kufikira pamene adamwalira, mudati: “Allah sadzatumiza mneneri wina pambuyo pake.” Motero Allah amamulekelera kusokera yemwe ali opyola malire poononga, wokaikira kwambiri
